name: Oscar Seagle
description: '''Oscar Seagle''' (October 31, 1877 â€“ December 19, 1945) was a prominent musician and music teacher active in the early 20th century.  He founded the Seagle Music Colony (since 2021, the Seagle Festival) in [[Schroon Lake (hamlet), New York|Schroon Lake, New York]].
